QuestData.Title: The Shadewalker
QuestData.Description: Now that the demon gates have been destroyed, the power of the forest must be replenished. The Forest Heart must be retrieved!$B$BGaivan Shadewalker, a powerful druid of the claw, has gone southwest, past Felfire Hill, to the Dor'Danil Barrow Den. Therein rests the Forest Heart. It is protected by the druids of Ashenvale deep below the ground.$B$BSeek out Gaivan and tell him of what has transpired, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Gaivan Shadewalker pacing outside the entrance to the Dor'Danil Barrow Den in Ashenvale.
QuestData.RewardText: You are brave to come here, $c, but you may be too late. All of the druids are either dead or have been driven insane.$B$BStill, your tale is intriguing, and if what you say is true, then Gnarl must have the Forest Heart and soon, or Ashenvale will begin to wither!
